Text:

Big ups to NLUPPER.

Anyway I have issues playing this on passive LG trough USB. Never got any troubles with .mkv files or 1080p res before but Im getting "invalid file" error anyone else having same problem?
Getting "unknown file" error on my 51" samsung plasma as well,direct from usb.
